module.title: User Agent
module.name: wink.ua
module.description: The ua object provides a layer of abstraction with all specifics related to the platform hosting the code. It allows the user to make different implementations consistent with the platform and / or the target browser.

page.description: This page lists all system properties related to the client platform and browser.

module.compatibility: Iphone OS2, Iphone OS3, Iphone OS4, Android 1.1, Android 1.5, Android 2.1, Android 2.2, Android 2.3, BlackBerry 6, Bada 1.0

instanciation.description: ua is a Literal, so it did not need to be instantiated.
